Key Match Events: The White Sox got a 7-2 victory against the Boston Red Sox with a good start from Chris Flexen, scoreless relief from the bullpen and five runs in the ninth to break a 2-2 tie.
Pre-Game Insights: Assistant GM says 'you have to see big picture' amidst the historically bad season.
Others: The White Sox could lose another 100 games in 2025.
